chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_19
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
d.
1.1.2 Universal Screening for GDM, HIV and Syphilis
1.1.2.1 CHO should ensure that all the pregnant women should mandatorily have tested for GDM, HIV and 
Syphilis in VHSND clinic.
1.1.3 Janani Suraksha Yojana (JSY): 
1.1.3.1 CHO should ensure that all the ANC mothers have got their bank account opened so that the direct 
benefit transfer of incentives can happen.
1.1.4 Janani Shishu Suraksha Karyakram (JSSK)
